data.eml:eml: A new Mexican species of Rhyparus Westwood (Coleoptera: Scarabaeidae: Aphodiinae), with new records and a key to the Mexican and Guatemalan species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mora-Aguilar, Eder F., Delgado, Leonardo (2019): A new Mexican species of Rhyparus Westwood (Coleoptera: Scarabaeidae: Aphodiinae), with new records and a key to the Mexican and Guatemalan species. Zootaxa 4609 (1): 196-200, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4609.1.13
